vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.16.1;
father of: Jehu (H3058)
§ Hanani = "gracious"
1) one of the sons of Heman, a chief musician of David, and head of the 18th course of the service
2) a seer who rebuked Asa, king of Judah, and was imprisoned
2a) maybe, father of Jehu the seer who testified against Baasha
3) one of the priests who in the time of Ezra took a foreign wife
4) brother of Nehemiah whom Nehemiah appointed governor of Jerusalem
5) another priest who was the chief musician under Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre del profeta Jehú; (b)   hijo de Hemán; cantor del templo; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   descendiente de Imer; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico; (d)   hermano de Nehemías; (e)   sacerdote; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈拿尼 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "優雅的"
1) 希幔的眾子之一, 大衛王的一位樂班的首領, 負責第十八班的服事 (代上 25:4,25)
2) 巴沙的先知耶戶的父親 (王上 16:1,7)
3) 以斯拉時代的祭司之一, 他曾娶了一外邦女子為妻 (拉 10:20)
4) 尼希米的兄弟, 被尼希米指派負責管理耶路撒冷的人之一 (尼 7:2)
5) 一位尼希米帶領的祭司, 他是負責樂班的人之一 (尼 12:36)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈拿尼 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "优雅的"
1) 希幔的众子之一, 大卫王的一位乐班的首领, 负责第十八班的服事 (代上 25:4,25)
2) 巴沙的先知耶户的父亲 (王上 16:1,7)
3) 以斯拉时代的祭司之一, 他曾娶了一外邦女子为妻 (拉 10:20)
4) 尼希米的兄弟, 被尼希米指派负责管理耶路撒冷的人之一 (尼 7:2)
5) 一位尼希米带领的祭司, 他是负责乐班的人之一 (尼 12:36)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.4;
son of: Heman (H1968I);
brother of: Bukkiah (H1232), Mattaniah (H4983H), Uzziel (H5816J), Shebuel (H7619H), Jerimoth (H3406L), Hananiah (H2608P), Eliathah (H0448), Giddalti (H1437), Romamti-ezer (H7320), Joshbekashah (H3436), Mallothi (H4413), Hothir (H1956), Mahazioth (H4238)
§ Hanani = "gracious"
1) one of the sons of Heman, a chief musician of David, and head of the 18th course of the service
2) a seer who rebuked Asa, king of Judah, and was imprisoned
2a) maybe, father of Jehu the seer who testified against Baasha
3) one of the priests who in the time of Ezra took a foreign wife
4) brother of Nehemiah whom Nehemiah appointed governor of Jerusalem
5) another priest who was the chief musician under Nehemiah

§ Hanani = "gracious"
1) one of the sons of Heman, a chief musician of David, and head of the 18th course of the service

2a) maybe, father of Jehu the seer who testified against Baasha
3) one of the priests who in the time of Ezra took a foreign wife
4) brother of Nehemiah whom Nehemiah appointed governor of Jerusalem
5) another priest who was the chief musician under Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.1.2;
son of: Hacaliah (H2446);
brother of: Nehemiah (H5166H)
§ Hanani = "gracious"
1) one of the sons of Heman, a chief musician of David, and head of the 18th course of the service
2) a seer who rebuked Asa, king of Judah, and was imprisoned
2a) maybe, father of Jehu the seer who testified against Baasha
3) one of the priests who in the time of Ezra took a foreign wife
4) brother of Nehemiah whom Nehemiah appointed governor of Jerusalem
5) another priest who was the chief musician under Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.36;
son of: Jonathan (H3129K);
brother of: Zechariah (H2148Z), Shemaiah (H8098V), Azarel (H5832J), Milalai (H4450), Gilalai (H1562), Maai (H4597), Nethanel (H5417P) and Judah (H3063K)
§ Hanani = "gracious"
1) one of the sons of Heman, a chief musician of David, and head of the 18th course of the service
2) a seer who rebuked Asa, king of Judah, and was imprisoned
2a) maybe, father of Jehu the seer who testified against Baasha
3) one of the priests who in the time of Ezra took a foreign wife
4) brother of Nehemiah whom Nehemiah appointed governor of Jerusalem
5) another priest who was the chief musician under Nehemiah
